summary: Vampire Lords take Falling Damage while flying. That is silly. This fixes that.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21987-1-1344461093.png[/img]

[youtube]JNm2-8vlrTU[/youtube]

== Requires Dawnguard! ==

Why is it, as a flying vampire lord, you still take fall damage? NONSENSE I SAY.

When birds land on the ground, are they met with the sweet embrace of death? Nay.

This mod fixes that nonsense!

As a Vampire Lord, if you are in your flying spell stance, you no longer take ANY fall damage. But only if you are flying!

If you are on the ground using your claws, you will die. This only affects the Vampire Lord form, and only in flying stance!

= How!?! =

This mod, at run time, adds a perk to the player that checks
1. If you are the player
2. If you are in vampire lord form
3. If you are flying in the lord form

When those conditions are met, you take 0 fall damage. So much more sensible!

It also means this should work flawlessly, and not cause issues with anything. Since it doesn\'t alter any existing scripts, spells, blah blah. 

= Credit/Permission =

Danke Bethesda/Steam/Nexus

You may use this mod, translate it, gut it, merge it, blah, however you like. Just give credit where it is due!
author: Supernastypants
